column1: * Spoken form, usually not written; in writing, the unappended plural form (optionally followed by the full pronoun) is preferred.

column2: sléttandist ** ** the mediopassive present participle is extremely rare and normally not used; it is never used attributively or predicatively, only for explicatory subclauses
